title: 22 minute queue dodge timer because of freezing!
body: My client froze in champ select! I accept the match, it loaded, i clicked a champion to ban and then it freezes when it says 27 seconds. It's happened twice in a row. I lost LP for it. I'm now at -4 in silver 5. If i get demoted for this I'll be so pissed! I had a 5 minute wait timer for the first freeze, and now on this second freeze I have a 22 minute wait time! Riot, fix please! And give me back my LP!!!!!!!! This is so unfair.

replies.body: Most of the time you'll only see those freezes in champion select if your network is having a hard time communicating with our servers. Let's take a quick minute to troubleshoot those settings by going through the steps in this [**network settings guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

http://i58.photobucket.com/albums/g267/hannahfan12/ConnectionSpeedProof.png
It happened again today so I was able to screen shot the speed. If it happens another time I will screen shot the freezing and post that as well. Please fix this because I am banned for dodging!

Make sure you go through those steps I linked in the [**network settings guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some troubleshooting to make sure your network is able to keep its connection throughout the champion select lobby.
